misc: If not on the course, he is probably billing clients
biography: Lassi, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, brings a unique blend of legal acumen and golfing talent to the competition. Representing Lakeside Golf Vammala, Lassi's journey in the tournament has been marked by consistent performance and a relentless pursuit of excellence. Hector Trophée 2025 will mark his ninth appearance in the prestigious tournament.

Beyond the greens, Lassi is a practicing lawyer, known for his sharp intellect and meticulous attention to detail. His colleagues often joke that if he is not on the course, he is probably billing clients, showcasing his dedication to both his passions.

While the coveted Hector Trophée has eluded him thus far, Lassi has tasted individual glory by winning the Victor Trophy in the past. His strategic mind and calm demeanor make him a formidable competitor in both individual and pair formats. This year, Lassi hopes to add the title of Hector Trophée champion to his already impressive golfing resume.
